Introduction

RoaD-B (formerly known as BXK) was a five-member boy group under Campus Entertainment. They debuted on November 2, 2020, with the digital single "Fly High".

They were originally scheduled to debut at the end of July 2020, after releasing their pre-debut song "Fly High" and its accompanying music video, but it did not occur after the month had passed.

On January 1, 2022, BXK rebranded to RoaD-B.

They are presumed to have disbanded as their social media has been inactive since late 2023.
